instructions.desktop:
🌱 Move with WASD or arrow keys
⚡ SPACE to plant/harvest at closest plot
💧 E to water plants
📹 C to toggle camera mode
🌿 Plants grow automatically (3 stages)
🔒 Unlock plots by getting close and pressing SPACE
🌙 Watch the day/night cycle!
🖱️ Drag to rotate camera view
🔍 Scroll wheel to zoom in/out
instructions.mobile:
🕹️ Use virtual joystick to move
🌱 Tap green button to plant/harvest
💧 Tap blue button to water plants
📹 Use camera controls to change view
📋 Access panels via bottom menu
👆 Touch and drag to rotate camera
🤏 Pinch to zoom in/out

welcome.title: Welcome to Pixel-Harvest!
welcome.description: Welcome to your new farm! You're about to learn how to grow crops, manage animals, and build a thriving agricultural business. This tutorial will guide you through all the essential game mechanics step by step.
hints: You can skip any step by clicking "Skip Step"
Use keyboard arrows to navigate between steps
Press ESC to exit the tutorial at any time

character_movement.title: Moving Your Character
character_movement.description: Let's start by learning how to move around your farm! Desktop: Use ZQSD keys or arrow keys to move. Mobile: Use the virtual joystick in the bottom-left corner. Try moving your character around now. Notice how the camera follows you!
hints: The character position is shown in the top-right corner
You can drag the mouse to rotate the camera view
Scroll wheel zooms in and out

camera_controls.title: Camera Controls
camera_controls.description: You can control the camera to get the best view of your farm. Desktop: Press C to toggle camera mode, drag mouse to rotate, scroll to zoom. Mobile: Use the camera button, drag to rotate, pinch to zoom. Try toggling the camera mode now!
hints: Character Follow mode keeps the camera centered on your character
Free Camera mode lets you look around independently
You can zoom in to see details or zoom out for a wider view

farm_plots.title: Understanding Farm Plots
farm_plots.description: Your farm is divided into plots where you can grow crops. Some plots are already unlocked, while others need to be purchased. Move close to a plot to see if you can interact with it. Unlocked plots have a brown soil color. Get close to an empty plot to continue!
hints: Brown plots are ready for planting
Gray plots need to be unlocked with coins
A green circle appears around your character when you can interact

planting_seeds.title: Planting Your First Seeds
planting_seeds.description: Great! Now you're close to a farm plot. Let's plant your first seeds! You start with some carrot seeds. Make sure carrots are selected in the plant selector, then press SPACE to plant. Plant a carrot seed now!
hints: Check the Plant Types panel to see your available seeds
Selected plant type is highlighted in blue
You need to be close to an empty plot to plant

plant_growth.title: Watching Plants Grow
plant_growth.description: Excellent! You've planted your first seed. Plants in Pixel-Harvest grow automatically over time through 3 stages: 🌱 Seedling → 🌿 Growing → 🥕 Mature. Weather and seasons affect growth speed. You can also water plants to help them grow faster!
hints: Plants grow faster in good weather
Watering plants speeds up growth
Different plants take different amounts of time to grow

watering_plants.title: Watering Your Plants
watering_plants.description: You can water your plants to help them grow faster! Get close to the plant you just planted and press E to water it. Watch for the watering animation and growth boost!
hints: Watered plants have a blue sparkle effect
Each watering session provides a growth boost
You can water plants at any growth stage

harvesting.title: Harvesting Crops
harvesting.description: When plants reach full maturity, they'll show their crop icon (like 🥕 for carrots). Get close to a mature plant and press SPACE to harvest it and add it to your inventory. For this tutorial, we'll simulate a mature plant. Try harvesting now!
hints: Mature plants show the final crop icon
Harvesting adds items to your inventory
You earn points and coins from harvesting

inventory_management.title: Managing Your Inventory
inventory_management.description: Great! You've harvested your first crop. Check your inventory to see what you've collected. The inventory shows all your crops, equipment, and animal products. You can sell items in the marketplace to earn coins!
hints: Inventory is divided into categories: crops, equipment, and animal products
Numbers show how many of each item you have
Items are automatically sorted by type

marketplace_intro.title: The Marketplace
marketplace_intro.description: The marketplace is where you buy seeds and equipment, and sell your crops for coins. Prices change dynamically based on supply and demand! Let's sell your harvested crop for some coins.
hints: Prices fluctuate based on market conditions
Selling crops is the main way to earn coins
Use coins to buy seeds, equipment, and unlock plots

selling_crops.title: Selling Your Crops
selling_crops.description: In the marketplace's "Sell Produce" section, click on "Sell Carrots" to sell your harvested crop. Watch your coin count increase when you make the sale! Try selling your carrot now.
hints: You can only sell items you actually have
Disabled buttons mean you have none of that item
Each sale gives you coins and experience

buying_seeds.title: Buying More Seeds
buying_seeds.description: Now that you have coins, you can buy more seeds to expand your farming operation! In the "Seeds" section of the marketplace, try buying some tomato seeds. Click "Buy Tomato Seeds" to purchase them.
hints: Different seeds have different costs and growth times
Some seeds are only available in certain seasons
Start with cheaper seeds and work your way up

changing_plant_types.title: Selecting Plant Types
changing_plant_types.description: Great! You now have tomato seeds. To plant them, you need to select tomatoes in the Plant Types panel. Click on the tomato button in the Plant Types panel to select it. Notice how the selected plant is highlighted in blue.
hints: Only the selected plant type will be planted
You can see how many seeds you have of each type
Some plants require specific seasons to grow

unlocking_plots.title: Unlocking New Plots
unlocking_plots.description: To expand your farm, you need to unlock new plots using coins. Move close to a gray (locked) plot and press SPACE to unlock it. Each plot costs coins to unlock, but gives you more space to grow crops!
hints: Locked plots appear gray and show an unlock cost
Unlocking plots permanently expands your farm
Start with plots close to your existing ones

objectives_system.title: Objectives and Goals
objectives_system.description: Check out the Objectives panel to see your current goals! Completing objectives gives you direction and rewards. Try to complete the visible objectives by playing the game naturally.
hints: Objectives provide guidance on what to do next
Completed objectives give rewards and unlock new ones
Focus on easier objectives first

day_night_cycle.title: Day and Night Cycle
day_night_cycle.description: Pixel-Harvest features a dynamic day/night cycle that affects gameplay! Different things happen during day and night - plants grow differently, and the atmosphere changes. Watch the time indicator to track the current time of day.
hints: The day/night cycle affects plant growth rates
Some animals are more active at certain times
The lighting and ambiance change with the time

weather_system.title: Weather Effects
weather_system.description: Weather affects how fast your plants grow and your overall farming efficiency. ☀️ Sunny weather makes plants grow faster. 🌧️ Rainy weather provides natural watering. ❄️ Cold weather slows growth but some plants thrive.
hints: Check the weather panel to plan your farming
Some plants prefer certain weather conditions
Weather changes randomly throughout the game

seasons_system.title: Seasonal Changes
seasons_system.description: The game features four seasons, each lasting 20 in-game days: 🌸 Spring: Best for most crops. ☀️ Summer: Hot weather, great for heat-loving plants. 🍂 Autumn: Harvest season with unique crops. ❄️ Winter: Limited growing, but some special plants thrive.
hints: Some plants can only be grown in specific seasons
Seasonal events and festivals occur regularly
Plan your crops around the seasonal calendar

animals_intro.title: Farm Animals
animals_intro.description: You can buy and raise animals on your farm! Animals produce valuable resources: 🐔 Chickens produce eggs. 🐄 Cows produce milk. 🐷 Pigs find truffles. Take care of your animals and collect their products regularly!
hints: Animals need regular care and feeding
Collect products daily for maximum profit
Animal products sell for good prices

daily_quests.title: Daily Quests
daily_quests.description: Complete daily quests to earn extra rewards and experience! Quests reset daily and provide specific goals to work towards. Check the Daily Quests panel to see what challenges await you.
hints: Quests provide bonus coins and experience
New quests appear daily
Focus on quests that match your current activities

equipment_intro.title: Farm Equipment
equipment_intro.description: As you progress, you can buy equipment to automate and improve your farm: 💧 Auto Sprinklers: Automatically water nearby plants. 🌿 Fertilizer: Boosts plant growth speed. 🏠 Greenhouses: Protect plants from weather.
hints: Equipment is expensive but saves time in the long run
Some equipment works automatically
Upgrade your farm gradually as you earn more coins

game_menu.title: Game Menu and Settings
game_menu.description: Access the game menu in the top-right corner for various options: ⚙️ Controls: Customize your keyboard controls. 🔧 UI Mode: Rearrange interface panels. 🆕 New Game: Start fresh anytime. 🌍 Language: Change the game language.
hints: Customize controls to your preference
Save your game progress automatically
UI Mode lets you drag panels around

mobile_controls.title: Mobile Controls
mobile_controls.description: On mobile devices, use these touch controls: 🕹️ Virtual joystick for movement. 🌱 Green button to plant/harvest. 💧 Blue button to water plants. 📋 Bottom menu for panels. Touch and drag to rotate camera, pinch to zoom.
hints: Mobile interface adapts automatically
Use the navigation menu at the bottom
Panels open as full-screen overlays on mobile

tutorial_complete.title: Tutorial Complete!
tutorial_complete.description: Congratulations! You've learned all the basics of Pixel-Harvest! Here's what you've mastered: Character movement and camera controls, Planting, watering, and harvesting crops, Buying and selling in the marketplace, Unlocking new farm plots, Understanding objectives and quests, Farm animals and their products, Weather and seasonal systems. Now go build your farming empire!
hints: Remember: you can restart this tutorial anytime from the game menu
Experiment with different crops and strategies
Have fun and enjoy your farming adventure!
